display_long_description:
Step into the driver’s seat in City Bus Simulator: Parking & Driving! Experience the thrill of navigating busy city streets while picking up passengers and mastering challenging parking scenarios. Whether you’re manoeuvring tight corners, following realistic traffic rules, or tackling multi-level parking lots, this simulator offers hours of immersive driving fun.
Key Features:
Realistic Bus Driving – Handle city buses with accurate controls and physics.


Parking Challenges – Test your skills in tight spaces and complex parking areas.


City Routes – Explore urban streets filled with traffic, turns, and obstacles.


Immersive Experience – Smooth controls, realistic sounds, and vibrant city environments.


Fun for All Players – Casual or hardcore simulator fans will enjoy the challenge.


Take your bus-driving skills to the next level and become the ultimate city bus driver. Are you ready to park, drive, and conquer the streets?
